title: Configuring VS Code for Magento 2 XML Autocompletion
subTitle: A Step-by-Step Guide to Setting Up VS Code for Magento 2 Development
description: Learn how to configure VS Code for autocompletion and validation of Magento 2 XML files, like module.xml, with this practical tutorial.
author: James Plant

metadata.title: Configuring VS Code for Magento 2 XML Autocompletion | The Bearded Developer | Shopify, Web Development, and Technology Solutions
metadata.description: A Step-by-Step Guide to Setting Up VS Code for Magento 2 Development, Learn how to configure VS Code for autocompletion of Magento 2 XML files.
